hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x
SCRIPTPATH=/vagrant/sql_scripts DBNAME="go_core" USER=root PASSWD=gymio RESULT=`mysqlshow -v --user=$USER --password=$PASSWD | grep -v Wildcard | grep -o $DBNAME`
echo "+++ DBNAME:$DBNAME" echo "+++ RESULT:$RESULT"
if [ $DBNAME == "$RESULT" ]; then echo "+++ Dropping $DBNAME DB ..." mysqladmin --force -u$USER -p$PASSWD drop $DBNAME echo 'CREATE DATABASE '$DBNAME' CHARACTER SET utf8;' | mysql -v -u $USER -p$PASSWD mysql -v -u $USER -p$PASSWD $DBNAME < $SCRIPTPATH/runFirst.sql else echo "+++ Creating $DBNAME DB ..." echo 'CREATE DATABASE '$DBNAME' CHARACTER SET utf8;' | mysql -v -u $USER -p$PASSWD mysql -v -u $USER -p$PASSWD $DBNAME < $SCRIPTPATH/runFirst.sql fi
